explains: v. （物体或表面）反射（热、光等）；（镜子等）照出；忠实反映；给当事人带来（荣誉或耻辱）；说蔑视……的话；认真思考；（使）偏离（reflect 的过去式及过去分词）
wordGroup: reflected glory 借重他人得来的荣耀

sentences.en: The sun reflected off the snow-covered mountains.
sentences.cn: 阳光从被雪覆盖的山峦反射回来。

sentences.en: Lights reflected off dust-covered walls creating a ghostly luminescence.
sentences.cn: 灯光照在满是灰尘的墙上，反射回苍白的冷光。

sentences.en: His face was reflected in the mirror.
